text: Di Tagi go Yihowah ga helekai, “Israel, mai mua loo gaa tugi dolomeenei, gei goodou gu haga balumee ogu mogobuna, gu hagalee hiihai e hagalongo mo di daumaha mai gi di Au. I hongo nia gonduu nnoonua mo i lala nia laagau mangamanga huogodoo, goodou nogo daumaha ang gi nia balu ieidu ala e hagababa bolo goodou ga hagadili godou dama.
